ComicInfo.Summary:
Six evil guns. Four killers. One madwoman. And an undead Confederate General. How did General Hume and his cutthroats come into possession of the guns? Their story—as well as a dark secret Drake would rather keep hidden—is revealed as a deadly trap is sprung on forbidden land.
